title: eevELa nanu
sahitya:
I vELa nannu brOvara aannayya krSNa





caraNam 1



 ati viharamucE nI sannidhi kEgitira gati nAku nIvE gadara annayya krSNa

   



caraNam 2



 cinna prAyamu nADE kOriyunnAnu kanna taNDri nIvE kadara annayya krSNa

   



caraNam 3



 nannAdarincura nA muddu rangayya kannaDa sEyakura annayya krSNa

   



caraNam 4



 enni vidhambula sannutincina nAvinnapamu vinarAdA annayya krSNa 

   



caraNam 5



 pakSamutODa nA kaSTamulanu dIrcci rakSimpa jAlamElarA annayya krSNa

   



caraNam 6



 kanakAmbaradhara kAmita phalada nA manavini maravakura annayya krSNa

   



caraNam 7



 rAma bhadrAcaladhAma rAmadAsuni prEmatO kApADura annayya krSNa
